name: Luminera: The Radiant Journey
description:
Roll the Dice to decide your fate!

Luminera is a turn based RPG with point and click exploration. Heavily inspired by Avatar: The Last Airbender and D&D Mechanics, Luminera is an attempt to create a fun single player D&D experience with an imaginative world focused on 8 different elements and how they influence different cultures. Play one of 6 playthroughs or Build Your Own Adventure with Free Play and select your own team. Each character brings something special to the table from taking Assassination contracts with Kyra, growing plants with Melody or learning to cook with Luta.

24 characters have come together to embark on a Pilgrimage to visit the 8 Elemental Conduits. They'll soon find that their journey will be wrought with the dangers of the wild and the tragedies of war. Each member is taking this Pilgrimage for their own personal reason, and you'll learn about your characters' backstory over time as the journey progresses.

This demo contains the first area of the Journey of Honor playthrough. Make your way through the Halcyon Woods with Aster, Elias, Kyra and Genevieve. 

This demo is VERY MUCH a screenshot into a WIP. There may be game breaking bugs, glitches, and so forth. Please let me know if you encounter such a thing. 

I've included a zip file and an installer, but you only need to download one of them.
